amendment.description: Amendment adds a requirement that the President consider the potential effects of a covered transaction on the efforts of the United States to curtail human smuggling and drug smuggling.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to add a requirement that the President consider the potential effects of a covered transaction on the efforts of the United States to curtail human smuggling.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
